result.eng: I feel that it is a cause for concern.
result.html: Is ábhar imní dhom éI feel that it is a cause for concern.
result.ponchtml: Is áḃar imní ḋom éI feel that it is a cause for concern.

result.eng: It doesn't concern you, it isn't your business.
result.html: Ní bhaineann sé leatIt doesn't concern you, it isn't your business.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃaineann sé leatIt doesn't concern you, it isn't your business.
